metadata.title: CVE-2016-5030 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The _dwarf_calculate_info_section_end_ptr function in libdwarf before20160923 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointerdereference) via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: dwarfutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
